name: paper-toast

events.name: core-overlay-open-completed
events.description: Fired when the `paper-toast` has completely opened.

events.name: core-overlay-close-completed
events.description: Fired when the `paper-toast` has completely closed.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: The text shows in a toast.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: The duration in milliseconds to show the toast.

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: Set opened to true to show the toast and to false to hide it.

attributes.name: responsiveWidth
attributes.description:
Min-width when the toast changes to narrow layout.  In narrow layout,
the toast fits at the bottom of the screen when opened.

attributes.name: swipeDisabled
attributes.description: If true, the toast can't be swiped.

attributes.name: autoCloseDisabled
attributes.description:
By default, the toast will close automatically if the user taps
outside it or presses the escape key. Disable this behavior by setting
the `autoCloseDisabled` property to true.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggle the opened state of the toast.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Show the toast for the specified duration

methods.name: dismiss
methods.description: Dismiss the toast and hide it.
